Functions
BersteinBasis
float BersteinBasis(
int index,
float u
)

Returns the value of the Nth variable for a cubic polynomial using the Berstein basis functions (i.e. used by cubic Bezier curves)

Parameters
index
int

which variable (0 - 3)

u
float

parameteric value to evaluate at (0.0 - 1.0)
